abstract: Albuquerque federal judge approves nearly $1 billion settlement between Obama administration and Native American tribes; class action suit accused government of shorting tribes on contracts to manage education, law enforcement and other federal services.
lead_paragraph: A judge has approved a nearly $1 billion settlement between Obama administration and Native American tribes over claims the government shorted tribes on contracts and other federal services

headline.main: New Mexico: Judge Signs Off on $1 Billion for Tribes
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Judge Signs Off on $1 Billion for Tribes

snippet: A judge has approved a nearly $1 billion settlement between Obama administration and Native American tribes over claims the government shorted tribes on contracts and other federal services
